event_name: Prime Timers (Senior Adults): Salad Bar Lunch and Hymn Sing

event.description: Come join us for lunch, fellowship and a time to sing your favorite Hymns. For lunch we will create an all you can eat Salad Bar and enjoy some sweet treats. If you would like to bring ingredients or a complete salad, please Dwight (503-317-4017) or Traci Drapela (503-317-4850). Requests can be made for your favorite hymn as well.
event.name: Prime Timers (Senior Adults): Salad Bar Lunch and Hymn Sing
event.summary:
Come join us for lunch, fellowship and a time to sing your favorite Hymns. 

For lunch we will create an all you can eat Salad Bar and enjoy some sweet treats. 

If you would like to bring ingredients or a complete salad, please Dwight (503-317-4017) or Traci Drapela (503-317-4850). 

Requests can be made for your favorite hymn as well.
